description: Securities Transaction Tax — Company-issued stocks & stock-rights certificates

Securities Transaction Tax — Corporate bonds & other government-approved securities: tax = transaction price (tp) × rate (Note: the site mentions a suspension period for certain bonds, but the calculator still shows the computed amount.)
Securities Transaction Tax — Government-approved call/put warrants: tax = transaction price (tp) × rate
Securities Transaction Tax — Warrant exercise (stock delivery): tax = exercise price (ep) × shares (sc) × rate
Securities Transaction Tax — Warrant exercise (cash settlement): tax = exercise price (ep) × shares (sc) × rate
Futures Transaction Tax — Stock-price futures: tax = contract amount (ca) × rate
Futures Transaction Tax — Interest-rate futures (30-day CP interest rate futures): tax = contract amount (ca) × rate
Futures Transaction Tax — Interest-rate futures (10-year Taiwan government bond futures): tax = contract amount (ca) × rate
Futures Transaction Tax — Options / futures options: tax = premium amount (pa) × rate
Futures Transaction Tax — Gold futures: tax = contract amount (ca) × rate
